name: CSS-Base
prompt: Generate ONLY CSS code for base styles. Universal reset: margin 0, padding 0, box-sizing border-box. Body: background #000, width 100vw, height 100vh, overflow hidden, font-family Roboto sans-serif, color white. Canvas id='fire-canvas': position fixed, top 0, left 0, width 100%, height 100vh, z-index 1.

name: CSS-Controls
prompt: Generate ONLY CSS code for control panel. #controls: position fixed, bottom 20px, right 20px, background rgba(20,20,20,0.8), padding 20px, border-radius 10px, z-index 10, width 280px. h2: color #ff8800, font-size 18px, margin-bottom 15px. Labels: display block, margin 10px 0, font-size 12px. Input range: width 100%, accent-color #ff0000. Buttons: background linear-gradient(#ff8800, #ff0000), border none, color white, padding 10px, border-radius 5px, cursor pointer, margin 5px, transition transform 0.2s. Button hover: transform scale(1.05).

name: CSS-Gauge
prompt: Generate ONLY CSS code for temperature gauge and FPS counter. #temperature-gauge: position fixed, top 20px, left 20px, width 40px, height 300px, background linear-gradient(to top, #ff0000 0%, #ff8800 33%, #ffff00 66%, #ffffff 100%), border 2px solid white, border-radius 20px, z-index 10. #fps-counter: position fixed, top 20px, right 20px, background rgba(0,0,0,0.7), color #ffff00, padding 8px 15px, border-radius 5px, font-size 14px, z-index 10.
